text:
Does something like this help? You are able to pull dynamic values into the canonical URL settings...
<https://www.loom.com/share/79c0a239209740778a7abd3c4a58ad3d?sid=2a5f8ebd-ee77-46f4-9987-2ae1a9c2e824|https://www.loom.com/share/79c0a239209740778a7abd3c4a58ad3d?sid=2a5f8ebd-ee77-46f4-9987-2ae1a9c2e824>

Hey all, what I can say is the teams are actively working to improve the performance of all of our scripts. Sadly each one is handled individually by different teams so they’re all on different timelines.

Regarding the cookie banner, we recently released a new version of the cookie banner - it requires opt-in to get it. I have not personally tested it’s performance but it’s likely an improvement over the v1 cookie banner.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/sunsetting-v1-of-the-cookie-consent-banner-in-favor-of-v2>
<@U7SL518D6> Thanks so much for the heads up :orange_heart:
